title: Strawberries with Balsamic Vinegar
introduction: Strawberries with Balsamic Vinegar is a delightful dessert that elevates the sweetness of strawberries with the rich, complex flavors of aged balsamic vinegar. This Italian-inspired dish is simple yet sophisticated, making it the perfect end to any meal. The tangy vinegar acts as a splendid companion to the natural sweetness of strawberries, creating a balanced and refreshing treat.
ingredients: 1 pint wild or cultivated strawberries, sliced if large
2 tablespoons best-quality aged balsamic vinegar, or to taste
instructions: In a medium bowl, toss the strawberries with the vinegar and sugar.
